00033 /*
00034  *  Function pointer for reading data (part of the data source interface)
00035  *  \param data     The ancillary "helper" data
00036  *  \param buf      The buffer to store the image data
00037  *  \param size     The size (usually numColumns * numBytesPerPixel)
00038  *  \param error    populated on error
00039  */
00040 typedef NITF_BOOL(*NITF_IDATASOURCE_READ) (NITF_DATA *data,
00041         char *buf, nitf_Off size, nitf_Error *error);
00042 
00043 
00044 /*
00045  *  Function pointer for destructing the data structure (part of the data source interface)
00046  *  \param data     The ancillary "helper" data
00047  */
00048 typedef void (*NITF_IDATASOURCE_DESTRUCT) (NITF_DATA *);
00049 
00054 typedef nitf_Off (*NITF_IDATASOURCE_GET_SIZE) (NITF_DATA *);
00055 
00061 typedef void (*NITF_IDATASOURCE_SET_SIZE) (NITF_DATA *, nitf_Off size);
00062

00064 
00072 typedef struct _nitf_IDataSource
00073 {
00074     NITF_IDATASOURCE_READ read;
00075     NITF_IDATASOURCE_DESTRUCT destruct;
00076     NITF_IDATASOURCE_GET_SIZE getSize;
00077     NITF_IDATASOURCE_SET_SIZE setSize;
00078 }
00079 nitf_IDataSource;
00080

00090 {
00091     nitf_IDataSource *iface;
00092     NITF_DATA *data;
00093 }
00094 nitf_DataSource;
